summary: A workout and fitness app or website
architectural_notes: Consider payment gateway integration for membership system
Design scalable video content delivery system
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Rest timer icon with stopwatch design in energetic orange theme (rest-timer-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Workout plan icon showing stacked documents or checklist (workout-plan-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Home workout icon with house and fitness symbols (home-workout-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a workout logging system where users can record exercises with sets, reps, and weight
Implement a workout history view that displays past workouts in chronological order
Create an exercise library with common exercises categorized by muscle group
Add progress tracking that shows workout statistics over time including total workouts, exercises completed, and volume lifted
Design a vibrant, energetic interface with a creative visual theme featuring bold colors, dynamic typography, and motivational styling that encourages fitness activity
Display generated fitness-themed images including hero background, workout category icons, and motivational graphics as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
Add a rest timer feature that allows users to set and track rest periods of 1-2 minutes between sets during workout logging
Create a workout plan management system where users can create, save, and follow structured workout plans instead of only logging individual workouts
Design the interface to be accessible and intuitive for users aged 10-60 years with appropriate font sizes, contrast ratios, and simplified navigation patterns
Add a home workout category to the exercise library with bodyweight exercises suitable for home training without equipment

new_feature_requests.summary: Add rest timer (1-2 minutes) between sets
Add membership/subscription system with video workout content
Make interface accessible for ages 10-60 years
